narrative.narrative: Founded in 1999 as Aerotex Airlines, RusLine has been their name since March 2013. In 2010 thet acquired the assets and brand name of Air Volga which included six CRJ-200's. They use Domodedovo Airport in Moscow as their primary base but have several throughout Russia. They also offer charter services. They offer service to 30 destinations most of those being in Russia. Their current fleet consists entirely of CRJ-100's and CRJ-200's.
